verifyEmail.subject: Verify your email address
verifyEmail.body: Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verifyEmail.expiry: This link will expire in 24 hours.
verifyEmail.ignore: If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

adminInvite.subject: You've been invited to join the admin team
adminInvite.body: You've been invited to join the {{appName}} admin team as a {{role}}.
adminInvite.bodyDetails: As an admin, you'll have access to the internal dashboard to help manage users and support our community.
adminInvite.expiry: This invitation will expire in 7 days.
adminInvite.ignore: If you weren't expecting this invitation, you can safely ignore this email.

resetPassword.subject: Reset your password
resetPassword.body: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.
resetPassword.ignore: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.

welcome.subject: Welcome to {{appName}}!
welcome.body: Thank you for joining {{appName}}. We're excited to have you on board.
welcome.support: If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our support team.

inviteToGroup.subject: You've been invited to join {{groupName}}
inviteToGroup.body: {{inviterName}} has invited you to join {{groupName}} on {{appName}}.
inviteToGroup.ignore: If you don't want to join, you can safely ignore this email.

waitlist.subject: You're on the waitlist for {{appName}}!
waitlist.title: You're on the list!
waitlist.body1: Thanks for joining our waitlist! We're building something special and can't wait to share it with you.
waitlist.body2: We'll keep you updated on our progress and let you know as soon as we're ready for you to try.
waitlist.body3: In the meantime, feel free to reply to this email with any questions or feedback!

activated.subject: Welcome to {{planName}}!
activated.body: Thank you for subscribing to {{planName}}! Your subscription is now active and you have full access to all premium features.

paymentFailed.subject: Action required: Payment failed
paymentFailed.body: We were unable to process your subscription payment. We'll automatically retry on {{retryDate}}.

trialEnding.subject: Your trial is ending soon
trialEnding.body: Your free trial of {{planName}} will end on {{trialEndDate}}. To continue enjoying all the premium features, please upgrade your subscription.
